title: Boards Glitch
body: Keeps saying I must be level 7 to comment or upvote / downvote something yet I am level 20. How fix?

replies.body: Sometimes an account may need to sync when you first post.  It looks like you've already sync'd up and should be able to post without issue!  Let me know if you still have trouble commenting.
Thanks! As soon as I posted this I was then able to comment and upvote/downvote other things
